original: de bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'byung bar @334b 'gyur ba la sogs pa la byung ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par rtogs pa yod kyi sel ba ni bsgrub bya nyid la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par rtogs pa srid pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du 'byung ba dang 'byung bar @334b 'gyur ba la sogs pa la byung ba la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par rtogs pa yod kyi sel ba ni bsgrub bya nyid la sogs pa'i dus kyi khyad par rtogs pa srid pa ma yin te /
translated: Likewise, there is the understanding of the distinction of time, such as ‚Äúarisen‚Äù and ‚Äúwill arise,‚Äù etc., but it is not possible that the exclusion has the understanding of the distinction of time, such as ‚Äúthe object to be established,‚Äù etc.

original: med par ro gcig pa nyid kyis grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: med par ro gcig pa nyid kyis grub zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is already established by the oneness of the taste of non-existence.

original: de lta bas na sel ba sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs la bsgrub bya nyed du shes pa dang / byung ba la sogs pa shes pa ni rgyu mtshan med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnod pa'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na sel ba sgra'i don yin pa'i phyogs la bsgrub bya nyed du shes pa dang / byung ba la sogs pa shes pa ni rgyu mtshan med par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnod pa'o //
translated: Therefore, in the position that exclusion is the meaning of a word, the understanding of the object to be established and the understanding of ‚Äúarisen,‚Äù etc., would be without a cause. This is the refutation.

original: byung sogs ngo bo zhes bya ba ni byung ba la sogs pa nges pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: byung sogs ngo bo zhes bya ba ni byung ba la sogs pa nges pa 'dzin pa'i shes pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of arisen, etc.‚Äù means the consciousness that apprehends the ascertainment of ‚Äúarisen,‚Äù etc.

original: yang ma khyab pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir grags pas gnod pa nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: yang ma khyab pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir grags pas gnod pa nyid ston pa ni /
translated: Again, in order to demonstrate non-pervasion, he demonstrates the refutation by what is renowned:

original: sgrub pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: sgrub pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThe object to be established,‚Äù etc.

original: sogs pa smos pas mgron du bos pa dang / bod pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa smos pas mgron du bos pa dang / bod pa la sogs pa gzung ngo //
translated: The words ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicate that the term ‚Äúand so on‚Äù includes the Tibetan term ‚Äúand so on.‚Äù

original: 'di la gzhan sel ba'i gzhan rnam par gcod pa des par byed pa yod kyi /
analyzed: 'di la gzhan sel ba'i gzhan rnam par gcod pa des par byed pa yod kyi /
translated: The reason for this is that the exclusion of other is present in this term,

original: de la ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo'i dgag par bya ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa 'di nyid 'dir rgyu yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no /
analyzed: de la ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo'i dgag par bya ba yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa 'di nyid 'dir rgyu yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no /
translated: but the object of negation that is the entity of an affirming negative is not present in this term.

original: lha spyin mi 'tshed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dgag pa'i thog tu 'gag pa sbyor na sel ba ci 'dra 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
analyzed: lha spyin mi 'tshed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la dgag pa'i thog tu 'gag pa sbyor na sel ba ci 'dra 'gyur ba yin zhe na /
translated: What is the exclusion in the case of a statement such as ‚ÄúDevadatta is not an eater of food‚Äù?

original: ci yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ci yang ma yin te /
translated: It is nothing at all.

original: dgag pa gnyis kyis sgrub pa nyid la reg pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa gnyis kyis sgrub pa nyid la reg pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the two negatives come into contact with each other, they become an affirming negative.

original: gzhan yang dang la sogs pa tshig gi phrad dang nye bar bsgyur ba dang las brjod pa la sogs pa rnams tshig tu 'dod la /
analyzed: gzhan yang dang la sogs pa tshig gi phrad dang nye bar bsgyur ba dang las brjod pa la sogs pa rnams tshig tu 'dod la /
translated: Moreover, the words ‚Äúand so on‚Äù are asserted to be words that are particles, prefixes, and verbal roots.

original: yod pa rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di dgag pa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: yod pa rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir 'di dgag pa dang 'brel pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it related to negation because it does not express existence.

original: 'di ltar ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams bum pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgag pa dang 'brel pa yin na don gzhan bum pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir rnam par bcad pas dgag pa dang bral ba'i bum
analyzed: 'di ltar ji ltar bum pa la sogs pa'i sgra rnams bum pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i dgag pa dang 'brel pa yin na don gzhan bum pa la sogs pa yongs su gzung ba'i phyir rnam par bcad pas dgag pa dang bral ba'i bum
translated: For example, if the words pot and so on are related to negation, as in not a pot and so on, then because the meaning of the words pot and so on is apprehended as something other, it is imagined that the meaning of the word pot is a pot that is excluded from that which is not a pot.

original: pa'i sgra'i don du rtog pa de ltar dang la sogs pa dang ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dgag pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa la /
analyzed: pa'i sgra'i don du rtog pa de ltar dang la sogs pa dang ma yin pa la sogs pa'i dgag pa dang 'brel pa yod pa ma yin pa la /
translated: But that is not the case with the words and so on and not and so on, which are not related to negation.

original: dgag pa dang ma 'brel ba yang sel bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dgag pa dang ma 'brel ba yang sel bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: And it is not reasonable to eliminate that which is not related to negation.

original: de'i phyir dang la sogs pa sel ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir dang la sogs pa sel ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: Therefore and so on do not exist as eliminations.

original: sel ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sel ba med do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that eliminations do not exist.

original: gzhan yang ngag gi don khra bo'i dngos po ni khra bo'i glang du 'dod de /
analyzed: gzhan yang ngag gi don khra bo'i dngos po ni khra bo'i glang du 'dod de /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of the statement The entity of variegation is a variegated cow is that

original: de'i phyir de la gzhan las ldog par bstan par mi nus te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de la gzhan las ldog par bstan par mi nus te /
translated: Therefore, it is not possible to teach the exclusion of other in that.

original: grub pa'i ngo bo'i dgag pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: grub pa'i ngo bo'i dgag pa ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the negation of an established entity is not understood.

original: gang yang nag pa ba lang khrid de shog cig ces bya @335a * //
analyzed: gang yang nag pa ba lang khrid de shog cig ces bya @335a * //
translated: And in the statement ‚ÄúBring the black cow,‚Äù etc.,

original: ba la sogs pa la nag pa ma yin pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan ldog pa'i yan lag yongs su 'dzin pas brjod pa de ni tshig gi don du 'gyur gyi ngag gi don ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ba la sogs pa la nag pa ma yin pa la sogs pa rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan ldog pa'i yan lag yongs su 'dzin pas brjod pa de ni tshig gi don du 'gyur gyi ngag gi don ni ma yin no //
translated: the exclusion of non-black, etc., is not the meaning of the word, because it is included in the exclusion of other.

original: yan lag ma yin pa de ni da ltar rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir de la sgra'i don ma khyab par rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: yan lag ma yin pa de ni da ltar rnam par dbye bar mi nus pa'i phyir de la sgra'i don ma khyab par rnam par gnas so //
translated: That which is not a part cannot be distinguished now, so the meaning of the word is not established there without extension.

original: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba ma yin gzhan sel ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa sgra la sgrub pa'i ngo bo las gzhan ba'i brjod par bya ba mthong ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzhan sel ba ma yin gzhan sel ba yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa sgra la sgrub pa'i ngo bo las gzhan ba'i brjod par bya ba mthong ba ma yin te /
translated: Moreover, in the statement ‚ÄúIt is not the exclusion of other, it is the exclusion of other,‚Äù etc., the object of expression that is different from the nature of the probandum is not seen in the word.

original: ma dmigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: ma dmigs so zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that it is not perceived.

original: 'di ltar sel ba'i ngo bo tsam brjod bya nyid du mi rtogs te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sel ba'i ngo bo tsam brjod bya nyid du mi rtogs te /
translated: Thus, the mere nature of exclusion is not understood to be the object of expression,

original: dgag pa gnyis kyis sgrub ba nyid des pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dgag pa gnyis kyis sgrub ba nyid des pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the two negations are established by that.

original: sogs pa'i sgras gzhan las ldog pa dang gzhan rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs dang gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras gzhan las ldog pa dang gzhan rnam par gcod pa zhes bya ba'i rnam grangs dang gzung ngo //
translated: The words ‚Äúetc.‚Äù include the synonyms ‚Äúthe exclusion of other‚Äù and ‚Äúthe elimination of other.‚Äù

original: 'on te dgag pa yang dgag pa dang ldan zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi go ba'i phyir 'di zlog pa ma yin nam zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te dgag pa yang dgag pa dang ldan zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi go ba'i phyir 'di zlog pa ma yin nam zhe na /
translated: But is it not the case that this is negated by the very statement ‚Äúnegation has negation‚Äù?

original: 'di ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: 'di ni bden mod kyi /
translated: This is true.

original: 'on kyang gzhan sel ba sgra'i do na yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa smra ba'i rang gi chig nyid kyis sgrub par 'dod do zhes shes par bya ba'i don du yang brjod do //
analyzed: 'on kyang gzhan sel ba sgra'i do na yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa smra ba'i rang gi chig nyid kyis sgrub par 'dod do zhes shes par bya ba'i don du yang brjod do //
translated: However, it is also stated in order to make it understood that the statement ‚Äúexclusion of other is the object of a word‚Äù is intended to establish the statement of the opponent himself.

original: 'di ltar sel ba'i sgra ni sgra'i don gzhan sel ba ma yin pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar sel ba'i sgra ni sgra'i don gzhan sel ba ma yin pa rnam par gcad par bya ba yin la /
translated: Thus, the word ‚Äúexclusion‚Äù is to be taken as excluding that which is not the object of a word,

original: de yang sgrub pa las gzhan du mi mngon no //
analyzed: de yang sgrub pa las gzhan du mi mngon no //
translated: and that is not evident as anything other than an affirmation.

original: gang dag gzhal bya dang shes bya dang brjod bya la sogs pa'i sgra de dag la bsal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gang dag gzhal bya dang shes bya dang brjod bya la sogs pa'i sgra de dag la bsal bar bya ba yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The words ‚Äúapprehensible,‚Äù ‚Äúknowable,‚Äù ‚Äúexpressible,‚Äù and so on, do not have anything to be eliminated.

original: thams cad gzhal bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: thams cad gzhal bya ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are all of the nature of the apprehensible and so on.

original: 'di ltar gang yang 'di dag la rnam bar gcad par bya ba cung zad cig rtogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang yang 'di dag la rnam bar gcad par bya ba cung zad cig rtogs par byed de /
translated: In this way, nothing is understood to be eliminated in them.

original: thams cad rnam par gcad par bya ba'i rnam pas dmigs par bya ba yin pa na shes bya la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gnas te /
analyzed: thams cad rnam par gcad par bya ba'i rnam pas dmigs par bya ba yin pa na shes bya la sogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid du gnas te /
translated: Since everything is observed by the mode of elimination, they abide as the nature of the knowable and so on.

original: yul du ma byas pa ni rnam par gcad par bya ba mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul du ma byas pa ni rnam par gcad par bya ba mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that which is not taken as an object cannot be eliminated.

original: de lta yin dang 'di dag la bsal bar bya ba med pa'i phyir sgra'i don ma khyab pa nyid du rnam par gnas so //
analyzed: de lta yin dang 'di dag la bsal bar bya ba med pa'i phyir sgra'i don ma khyab pa nyid du rnam par gnas so //
translated: Since that is so, since there is nothing to be eliminated in them, the meaning of the words remains without pervasion.

original: 'on te rgyu'i sgro nas bstan pa'i shes bya ma yin pa gang zhig brtag par byas nas de rnam par bcad nas shes bya nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i phyir de ji ltar sgra'i don ma khyab pa nyid du rnam par gnas she na /
analyzed: 'on te rgyu'i sgro nas bstan pa'i shes bya ma yin pa gang zhig brtag par byas nas de rnam par bcad nas shes bya nyid du rjes su dpog pa'i phyir de ji ltar sgra'i don ma khyab pa nyid du rnam par gnas she na /
translated: But if it is not a knowable object that is indicated by the word cause, then how can it be the meaning of the word, since it is not pervaded by the word?

original: bsal bar bya ba rtogs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: bsal bar bya ba rtogs na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúIf one understands the object of exclusion,‚Äù and so on.

original: gal te shes bya nyid yin na yang bsal bar bya ba shes bya ma @335b yin pa nyid du yang yang dag par rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe dngos po nyid de 'jig rten gyis nges pa gang yin pa'i sgrub pa nyid sgra'i don du rtog pa mchog
analyzed: gal te shes bya nyid yin na yang bsal bar bya ba shes bya ma @335b yin pa nyid du yang yang dag par rtogs par byed pa de'i tshe dngos po nyid de 'jig rten gyis nges pa gang yin pa'i sgrub pa nyid sgra'i don du rtog pa mchog
translated: If one understands that although it is a knowable object, it is also a knowable object that is not an object of exclusion, then the very thing that is ascertained by the world is the best conception of the meaning of the word.

original: yin no // de lta na ni mthong ba sgro 'dogs pa dang mthong ba'i don la bsnyon bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: yin no // de lta na ni mthong ba sgro 'dogs pa dang mthong ba'i don la bsnyon bar bya bar mi 'gyur ro snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: In that case, one would not superimpose on what is seen, nor would one deny the object that is seen.

original: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ces bshad do //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir mchog ces bshad do //
translated: This is why he says ‚Äúbest.‚Äù

original: gang dag sgra thams cad kyi don ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan nyid yin la /
analyzed: gang dag sgra thams cad kyi don ni rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan nyid yin la /
translated: Those who say that the meaning of all words is a conceptual image,

original: de nyid kyang brjod par bya ba dang rnam par gcad par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag la shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di smos te /
analyzed: de nyid kyang brjod par bya ba dang rnam par gcad par bya ba dang rtogs par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba de dag la shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'di smos te /
translated: and that it is the expressed, the object of exclusion, and the cause of understanding, are refuted by this statement, ‚ÄúBecause the form of consciousness is refuted, etc.‚Äù

original: blo ni rnam pa med pa yin la phyi rol gyi ni don ni rnam ba dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: blo ni rnam pa med pa yin la phyi rol gyi ni don ni rnam ba dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: The mind is without form, but the external object has form.üîΩThe mind is clearly observed to be connected to an external object.

original: de phyi rol gyi yul la 'brel pa gsal por dmigs so zhes bya ba de lta bu kho bo cag gis shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pa de'i phyi nang gi blo la yod pa'i rnam pa ni med pa'i phyir de rjod par byed pa nyid kyi sgra dag
analyzed: de phyi rol gyi yul la 'brel pa gsal por dmigs so zhes bya ba de lta bu kho bo cag gis shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pa de'i phyi nang gi blo la yod pa'i rnam pa ni med pa'i phyir de rjod par byed pa nyid kyi sgra dag
translated: We refute the form of consciousness, but the form that exists in the internal mind does not exist. Therefore it is not logical that the sound that expresses it

original: kyang rigs pa ma yin la /
analyzed: kyang rigs pa ma yin la /
translated: is the expressed.

original: med pa nyid kyi phyir nang gi don de bsal bar bya ba nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: med pa nyid kyi phyir nang gi don de bsal bar bya ba nyid du rigs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And because it does not exist, it is not logical that the internal object is the object of exclusion.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya la sogs pa'i sgra dag la'o //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni gzhal bya la sogs pa'i sgra dag la'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat‚Äù refers to the words ‚Äúobject of knowledge‚Äù and so on.

original: gang yang de lta bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra de dag la yang bsal bar bya ba cung zad kyang ma dmigs te /
analyzed: gang yang de lta bu dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i sgra de dag la yang bsal bar bya ba cung zad kyang ma dmigs te /
translated: And in those words ‚Äúnot like that‚Äù and so on, there is nothing to be eliminated at all.

original: kha cig gi sbyor ba ni ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kha cig gi sbyor ba ni ma yin par dgag pa'i ngo bo med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of negation is not the negation of some thing.

original: ci ste yang de lta bu ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa med par dgag pa'i ngo bo'i dgag bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
analyzed: ci ste yang de lta bu ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa med par dgag pa'i ngo bo'i dgag bar 'gyur ro snyam du sems na /
translated: But if you think that the nature of negation is the negation of ‚Äúnot like that‚Äù and so on,

original: 'dir 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'di ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: then this is not correct.

original: 'di ltar 'di la yang de ltar min zhes bstan na /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'di la yang de ltar min zhes bstan na /
translated: Because in this case, if you say ‚Äúnot like that,‚Äù

original: dgag pa 'gegs par byed pa ste /
analyzed: dgag pa 'gegs par byed pa ste /
translated: then you are negating a negation.

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ma bkag na /üîΩrang gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ma bkag na / rang gi ngo bo nyid kyis gnas //
translated: If you do not negate ‚Äúlike that,‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i tshul de nyid 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: zhes bya ba sngar bshad pa'i tshul de nyid 'jug pa yin no //
translated: then the previously explained method, ‚Äúexisting by its own nature,‚Äù is applicable.

original: 'di thams cad ku m'a ra ri las bshad pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad ku m'a ra ri las bshad pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: All of this is presented in KumƒÅrila‚Äôs position.

original: da ni thams cad sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'od byed pas smras pa'i sel ba sun 'byin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
analyzed: da ni thams cad sgra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'od byed pas smras pa'i sel ba sun 'byin pa'i dogs pa bsu ba yin te /
translated: Now, ‚Äúall is sound‚Äù and so on, is a response to the qualm that the refutation is itself refuted.

original: des smras ba sel ba'i sgra'i don zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa yin te /
analyzed: des smras ba sel ba'i sgra'i don zhes bya ba 'di ni rigs pa yin te /
translated: The statement ‚ÄúThe meaning of the word is the exclusion of other‚Äù is correct.

original: khyad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a differentiator.

original: gang du phung po gnyis yod pa der gcig bkag pas cig shos rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gang du phung po gnyis yod pa der gcig bkag pas cig shos rtogs pa yin te /
translated: Where there are two classes, by excluding one, the other is understood.

original: ji ltar ba lang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig la ba lang rtogs pa na ba lang ma yin pa bkag pa yin pa /
analyzed: ji ltar ba lang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig la ba lang rtogs pa na ba lang ma yin pa bkag pa yin pa /
translated: For example, when a cow is understood in the statement ‚Äúnot a non-cow,‚Äù a non-cow is excluded.

original: thams cad kyi tshig la ni 'di yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: thams cad kyi tshig la ni 'di yod pa ma yin te /
translated: This is not the case with all words.

original: gang zhig @336a * //
analyzed: gang zhig @336a * //
translated: What is it?

original: thams cad kyi sgras bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thams cad kyi sgras bzlog par bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is nothing at all that is not to be negated by the word all.

original: ci ste 'di snyam du gcig la sogs pa thams cad ma yin pa de thams cad kyi sgras zlog par byed do snyam du sems na de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste 'di snyam du gcig la sogs pa thams cad ma yin pa de thams cad kyi sgras zlog par byed do snyam du sems na de ni ma yin te /
translated: But if you think that all is the negation of not one and so on, that is not so.

original: rang gi don la skur ba btab pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi don la skur ba btab pa'i skyon du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fault of denying one‚Äôs own object would ensue.

original: de lta na thams cad kyi sgra gcig la sogs pa sel bar 'jug pa na yan lag bkag pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: de lta na thams cad kyi sgra gcig la sogs pa sel bar 'jug pa na yan lag bkag pa'i phyir la /
translated: If that were so, when the word ‚Äúone‚Äù and so on is applied to the exclusion of all others, the word would be meaningless, because the parts would be negated,

original: yan lag can tha mi dad par khas mi len pa'i phyir don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yan lag can tha mi dad par khas mi len pa'i phyir don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and because we do not accept that the whole is not different from the parts.

original: yan lag gi sgras phyogs gcig brjod do //
analyzed: yan lag gi sgras phyogs gcig brjod do //
translated: The word ‚Äúpart‚Äù expresses a portion.

original: de ltar na tshogs pa las ma gtogs pa tshogs pa can gzhan khas mi lan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig bkag pa'i ngo bos 'jug pa'i tshogs pa'i sgra thams cad don med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na tshogs pa las ma gtogs pa tshogs pa can gzhan khas mi lan pa'i phyir phyogs gcig bkag pa'i ngo bos 'jug pa'i tshogs pa'i sgra thams cad don med par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, because we do not accept that the parts are other than the collection, the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù which is applied by the nature of the negation of the parts would be meaningless.

original: gnyis la sogs pa'i sgra yang tshogs pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: gnyis la sogs pa'i sgra yang tshogs pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir la /
translated: The word ‚Äútwo‚Äù and so on is also meaningless, because it has the collection as its referent,

original: gcig la sogs pa'i don bkag pas tshogs pa'i don bkag pa'i phyir don med pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: gcig la sogs pa'i don bkag pas tshogs pa'i don bkag pa'i phyir don med pa nyid yin no //
translated: and because the referent of the word ‚Äúcollection‚Äù is negated by the negation of the referents of the words ‚Äúone‚Äù and so on.

original: de ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ston pa ni /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says:

original: rnam pa de ltar 'gyur ma yin //
analyzed: rnam pa de ltar 'gyur ma yin //
translated: It does not occur in that way.

original: zhes bya ba ste rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i tshogs pa'i yul can de dag ni rnam pa de lta bur mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //üîΩgang yang ba lang gi sgra'i don ba lang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ba lang ma yin pa'i sel ba 'di ci dngos po'am /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ste rnam pa ji lta bur 'dod pa'i tshogs pa'i yul can de dag ni rnam pa de lta bur mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to // gang yang ba lang gi sgra'i don ba lang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i ba lang ma yin pa'i sel ba 'di ci dngos po'am /
translated: The meaning is that they do not have the aspect that is desired.

original: yang na dngos po med pa yin /
analyzed: yang na dngos po med pa yin /
translated: Moreover, is the exclusion of non-cow, which is the referent of the word ‚Äúcow,‚Äù a positive object or a negative object?

original: gal te dngos po yin na de ci ba lang yin nam yang na ba lang ma yin pa zhig yin zhes bya /
analyzed: gal te dngos po yin na de ci ba lang yin nam yang na ba lang ma yin pa zhig yin zhes bya /
translated: If it is a positive object, is it a cow or is it a non-cow?

original: gal te ba lang yin na ming la rtsod pa yin no //
analyzed: gal te ba lang yin na ming la rtsod pa yin no //
translated: If it is a cow, then you are arguing about the name.

original: ci ste ba lang gi sgra'i don ba lang ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ci ste ba lang gi sgra'i don ba lang ma yin pa zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: If it is a non-cow, then the referent of the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is a non-cow.

original: sgra'i don la shin tu mkhas so //
analyzed: sgra'i don la shin tu mkhas so //
translated: You are very learned about the referents of words!

original: ci ste dngos po med pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste dngos po med pa yin na /
translated: If it is a negative object,

original: de ni mi rigs te /
analyzed: de ni mi rigs te /
translated: that is not reasonable,

original: skul bar byed pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skul bar byed pa dang yang dag par rtogs pa'i yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not the object of an instigator or an understander.

original: dngos po med pa la sgra thos pa las skul ba dang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dngos po med pa la sgra thos pa las skul ba dang rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: And it is not possible to instigate or understand the hearing of sound in the absence of an entity.

original: de ston pa ni /
analyzed: de ston pa ni /
translated: The demonstration of that is as follows:

original: med ba 'di yang mi rigs te //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /üîΩskul bar byed pas na skul ba ste /üîΩston pa pos nyen pa po don la sbyor ba'o //üîΩde yang ston pa po'i chos yin la /üîΩyang dag par rtogs pa ni nyan pa po'i chos yin no //
analyzed: med ba 'di yang mi rigs te // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / skul bar byed pas na skul ba ste / ston pa pos nyen pa po don la sbyor ba'o // de yang ston pa po'i chos yin la / yang dag par rtogs pa ni nyan pa po'i chos yin no //
translated: This nonexistence is also not tenable.

original: sogs pa'i sgras bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i dngos po'i chos thams cad gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras bzho ba dang dgal ba la sogs pa'i dngos po'i chos thams cad gzung ngo //
translated: The term ‚Äúetc.‚Äù includes the entities of milking, churning, and so on.

original: gzhan yang sgra'i don ni shes pas rtogs pa yin la /
analyzed: gzhan yang sgra'i don ni shes pas rtogs pa yin la /
translated: Moreover, the meaning of a word is understood through consciousness,

original: ba lang gi sgra las 'ga' zhig kyang med @336b pa rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: ba lang gi sgra las 'ga' zhig kyang med @336b pa rtogs pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and it is not the case that the word cow causes the understanding of some nonexistent.

original: gzhan yang sel ba ni bya ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir yul du brjod par bya dgos la /
analyzed: gzhan yang sel ba ni bya ba'i ngo bo yin pa'i phyir yul du brjod par bya dgos la /
translated: Moreover, since exclusion is the nature of an action, it must be stated to be the object.

original: de la ba lang ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sel ba 'di ba lang gi yul la'ang /
analyzed: de la ba lang ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sel ba 'di ba lang gi yul la'ang /
translated: And in that regard, the exclusion ‚Äúnot non-cow‚Äù is the object of the word cow.

original: ba lang ma yin pa yul ma yin /
analyzed: ba lang ma yin pa yul ma yin /
translated: It is not the case that the non-cow is the object.

original: gal te ba lang yul yin na ba lang ba lang med par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te ba lang yul yin na ba lang ba lang med par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the cow were the object, how could the cow be the non-cow?

original: 'on te ba lang ma yin na sel ba yul gzhan sel bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te ba lang ma yin na sel ba yul gzhan sel bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
translated: But if the cow is not the object, how could the exclusion be the exclusion of another object?

original: seng ldeng bcad pa na shing pa la sha 'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //üîΩci ste ba lang ni ba lang ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa 'gegs na /
analyzed: seng ldeng bcad pa na shing pa la sha 'chad par 'gyur ba ma yin no // ci ste ba lang ni ba lang ma yin pa ma yin no zhes bya bar ba lang la ba lang ma yin pa 'gegs na /
translated: When the acacia is cut, the palasha is not cut.üîΩBut if the cow is not the non-cow, then the cow is excluded by the non-cow.

original: gang zhig dgag par bya ba gang gis ba lang ma yin par brtags zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang zhig dgag par bya ba gang gis ba lang ma yin par brtags zhes bya ba'o //
translated: By what is the cow imagined to be the non-cow, which is to be excluded?

original: de'i phyir 'di la rnam par rtog pa dang po gnyis shin tu 'brel pa med do snyam du bsams nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di la rnam par rtog pa dang po gnyis shin tu 'brel pa med do snyam du bsams nas /
translated: Therefore, thinking that the first two alternatives are completely incoherent,

original: gsum pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gsum pa nyid bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: in order to teach the third,

original: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says ‚Äúwhy?‚Äù and so on.

original: 'ong gi sgra ni bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: 'ong gi sgra ni bsdu ba'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúor‚Äù has a conjunctive sense.

original: ci'i phyir khyed cag ba lang zhes bya ba 'di'i sgra'i don ba lang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sel ba'i mtshan nyid 'di brjod ces bya ba ni ngag gi don no //
analyzed: ci'i phyir khyed cag ba lang zhes bya ba 'di'i sgra'i don ba lang ma yin no zhes bya ba'i sel ba'i mtshan nyid 'di brjod ces bya ba ni ngag gi don no //
translated: Why do you say that the meaning of the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù is the exclusion of non-cow? This is the meaning of the statement.

original: yang ci'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it not to be expressed?

original: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: gang gis zhes pa la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, ‚ÄúBy what, etc.‚Äù

original: sel ba'i rnam par rtog pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'di las kyang mi rigs te /
analyzed: sel ba'i rnam par rtog pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'di las kyang mi rigs te /
translated: Because the conception of exclusion is untenable, it is not reasonable even from this point of view.

original: 'di ltar gang 'di ba lang ba lang ma yin pa sel ba de ci ba lang las tha dad pa yin nam /
analyzed: 'di ltar gang 'di ba lang ba lang ma yin pa sel ba de ci ba lang las tha dad pa yin nam /
translated: Thus, is this exclusion of non-cow from cow different from cow?

original: 'on te tha mi dang pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te tha mi dang pa yin /
translated: Or is it not different?

original: de ci brten ba yin nam /
analyzed: de ci brten ba yin nam /
translated: Is it dependent?

original: 'on te mi brten pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te mi brten pa yin /
translated: Or is it not dependent?

original: gal te brten pa yin na de'i tshe brten pa yin pa'i phyir yon tan du 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te brten pa yin na de'i tshe brten pa yin pa'i phyir yon tan du 'gyur te /
translated: If it is dependent, then it is a quality because it is dependent.

original: de lta yin dang ba lang gi sgras yon tan nyid brjod kyi ba lang ni ma yin pa'i phyir ba lang gnas so //
analyzed: de lta yin dang ba lang gi sgras yon tan nyid brjod kyi ba lang ni ma yin pa'i phyir ba lang gnas so //
translated: If that is so, then the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù expresses a quality, not a cow, so it is a place for a cow.

original: pa lang 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa lang 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i gzhi mthun par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The basis of the expression cow-goer would not be common.

original: ci ste mi brten pa yin na de'i tshi don gang gis ba lang gi sel ba zhes drug par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ste mi brten pa yin na de'i tshi don gang gis ba lang gi sel ba zhes drug par 'gyur /
translated: But if it is not dependent, then by what meaning is it the sixth case, the ablative, in the expression the exclusion of cow?

original: 'on te tha mi dad na 'di ba lang nyid yin pa'i phyir cung zad kyang byas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'on te tha mi dad na 'di ba lang nyid yin pa'i phyir cung zad kyang byas pa ma yin /
translated: But if it is not different, then because it is cow itself, it is not produced in the least.

original: sel ba 'di yang dngos po so so la gcig yin pa'am du ma yin par brjod par bya /
analyzed: sel ba 'di yang dngos po so so la gcig yin pa'am du ma yin par brjod par bya /
translated: And this exclusion should be described as being one or many in relation to individual things.

original: gal te gcig yin na de'i tshe ba lang ni rdzas du ma dang 'brel pa 'di ni ba lang nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gal te gcig yin na de'i tshe ba lang ni rdzas du ma dang 'brel pa 'di ni ba lang nyid du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is one, then at that time, since the cow is related to many substances, it would not be cowhood.

original: ci ste du ma yin na de'i phyir gong bu bzhin du mtha' med pa'i phyir rjod par mi 'thad pas brjod bya ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste du ma yin na de'i phyir gong bu bzhin du mtha' med pa'i phyir rjod par mi 'thad pas brjod bya ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is many, then because it is endless like a heap, it is not tenable to express it, and so it would be inexpressible.

original: gzhan yang ci gzhan sel ba brjod par bya ba yin nam 'on te brjod par bya ba @337a * //
analyzed: gzhan yang ci gzhan sel ba brjod par bya ba yin nam 'on te brjod par bya ba @337a * //
translated: Moreover, should exclusion be expressed or not?

original: ma yin zhes bya ba 'di re zhig khyod la dri bar bya ste /
analyzed: ma yin zhes bya ba 'di re zhig khyod la dri bar bya ste /
translated: This is what should be asked of you first.

original: brjod par bya ba yin na sgrub pa'i ngo bos brjod par bya ba yin nam /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba yin na sgrub pa'i ngo bos brjod par bya ba yin nam /
translated: If it is an object of expression, is it an object of expression by the nature of affirmation?

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i sgo nas yin /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i sgo nas yin /
translated: Or is it by the nature of exclusion from other?

original: de la gal te sgrub pa'i ngo bos yin na /
analyzed: de la gal te sgrub pa'i ngo bos yin na /
translated: If it is by the nature of affirmation,

original: de'i tshe gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don gcig tu nges pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: de'i tshe gzhan sel ba sgra'i don yin no zhes bya ba'i sgra'i don gcig tu nges pa ma yin no ;
translated: then the meaning of the term ‚Äúthe meaning of a term is the exclusion of other‚Äù is not ascertained.

original: /'on te gzhan las ldog pa'i sgo nas so zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin na /
analyzed: /'on te gzhan las ldog pa'i sgo nas so zhes bya ba'i phyogs yin na /
translated: But if it is by the nature of exclusion from other,

original: gzhan rnam par gcod pa de yang gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gyis brjod pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: gzhan rnam par gcod pa de yang gzhan rnam par gcod pa'i ngo bo gzhan gyis brjod pa'i phyir la /
translated: then that exclusion of other is expressed by another exclusion of other,

original: de la yang gzhan yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de la yang gzhan yin pas thug pa med par 'gyur ro //
translated: and since that also is other, there is an infinite regress.

original: ci ste brjod bya ma yin pa yin na de'i tshe sgras sgra'i don gzhan sel bar byed do zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ci ste brjod bya ma yin pa yin na de'i tshe sgras sgra'i don gzhan sel bar byed do zhes bya ba dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But if it is not an object of expression, then it contradicts the statement ‚ÄúA term expresses the exclusion of other.‚Äù

original: 'di thams cad 'od byed pas smras pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di thams cad 'od byed pas smras pa nye bar bkod pa yin no //
translated: All of this is stated by ƒÄryadeva.

original: de la slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dang / rten rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang / don ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du gcig nyid dang / rtag pa dang / so so la yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rigs kyi chos sel ba nyid la gnas te /
analyzed: de la slob dpon phyogs kyi glang pos thams cad la tha dad pa med pa'i phyir dang / rten rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dang / don ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du gcig nyid dang / rtag pa dang / so so la yongs su rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rigs kyi chos sel ba nyid la gnas te /
translated: Because there is no difference in all, because the continuum of the basis is uninterrupted, and because all meanings are completely fulfilled, the characteristics of the class are, respectively, singularity, permanence, and complete fulfillment in each.üîΩTherefore, because the special qualities are superior, the exclusion of other is well established as the meaning of a word.

original: de lta bas na yon tan gyi khyad par khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba nyid sgra'i don du legs par gnas par yin no zhes bshad pa de dogs par byas nas ku m'a ra ri las bzhad gang du bya ba'i phyir mjug sdud pa ni
analyzed: de lta bas na yon tan gyi khyad par khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gzhan sel ba nyid sgra'i don du legs par gnas par yin no zhes bshad pa de dogs par byas nas ku m'a ra ri las bzhad gang du bya ba'i phyir mjug sdud pa ni
translated: In order to refute that, Kumarila's Upasakavrtti says:

original: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //üîΩdgag ldan pa /
analyzed: gzhan yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so // dgag ldan pa /
translated: Moreover, etc.üîΩIt is said that the word cow is not a mere negation.

original: de 'ba' zhig kho na la zhes bya ba ni grong gi phag ni bza' bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
analyzed: de 'ba' zhig kho na la zhes bya ba ni grong gi phag ni bza' bar bya ba ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa la'o //
translated: Only that refers to the village pig is not to be eaten, etc.

original: rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo nyid de mi 'dra ba'o //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba ni rang gi ngo bo nyid de mi 'dra ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúBy its own nature‚Äù means by its own essence, i.e., by its own form.

original: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni dgag pa dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: gzhan du zhes bya ba ni dgag pa dang bral ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúOtherwise‚Äù means without negation.

original: de ltar gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan gyi lugs kyi dogs pa bsu nas /üîΩde ltar gzhan sel ma shes phyir //
analyzed: de ltar gtso bo ji lta ba bzhin du gzhan gyi lugs kyi dogs pa bsu nas / de ltar gzhan sel ma shes phyir //
translated: Having thus anticipated the objection of the opponent‚Äôs system in accordance with the principal [matter],

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs pa rtsom mo //üîΩma yin dgag dang med pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pas lan 'debs pa rtsom mo // ma yin dgag dang med pa'o //
translated: he begins the reply with ‚ÄúBecause they do not understand the exclusion of other‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba ni ma yin par dgag pa med pa ste /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ma yin par dgag pa med pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúNegation and non-existence‚Äù means the absence of negation and non-existence.

original: ma yin par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid dang med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: ma yin par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid dang med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It means the characteristic of negation and the characteristic of non-existence.

original: blo dang don bdag dbye bas zhes bya ba ni blo'i bdag nyid kyi dbye ba dang don gyi bdag nyid dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: blo dang don bdag dbye bas zhes bya ba ni blo'i bdag nyid kyi dbye ba dang don gyi bdag nyid dbye bas zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: ‚ÄúBy the division of the nature of cognition and the nature of object‚Äù means by the division of the nature of cognition and the division of the nature of the object.

original: de la blo'i bdag nyid ni blo la snang ba'i @337b don dag la rjes su 'jug pa gcig gi ngo bo nyid du nges pa'o //
analyzed: de la blo'i bdag nyid ni blo la snang ba'i @337b don dag la rjes su 'jug pa gcig gi ngo bo nyid du nges pa'o //
translated: Among them, the nature of cognition is the ascertainment of the nature of a single [entity] in regard to the objects that appear to cognition.

original: don gyi bdag nyid ni don gyi rang bzhin te rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i don rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid ni don gyi rang bzhin te rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i don rang gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The nature of the object is the intrinsic identity of the object, which is the meaning of the term ‚Äúintrinsic identity of the object.‚Äù

original: 'di dag gi ni tha dad pa ni dbye ba zhes bsdu'o //
analyzed: 'di dag gi ni tha dad pa ni dbye ba zhes bsdu'o //
translated: The difference among these is their division.

original: de la blo'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de la blo'i bdag nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to demonstrate the intrinsic nature of the cognition, he says,

original: sre bar byed pa gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sre bar byed pa gcig ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe single cognition that apprehends . . .‚Äù

original: sngar zhes bya ba ni gong du spyi dgag pa ji ltar da t'a'i dang mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa ste /üîΩji ltar aa ru ra la sogs pa mang po rnams spyi med par yang rims la sogs pa zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig byed pa bzhin du khra bo la sogs pa yang don tha dad na yang spyi dngos por gyur pa med kyang rang bzhin
analyzed: sngar zhes bya ba ni gong du spyi dgag pa ji ltar da t'a'i dang mi 'jig pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa ste / ji ltar aa ru ra la sogs pa mang po rnams spyi med par yang rims la sogs pa zhi ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'bras bu gcig byed pa bzhin du khra bo la sogs pa yang don tha dad na yang spyi dngos por gyur pa med kyang rang bzhin
translated: ‚ÄúPreviously‚Äù refers to the refutation of universals above, as explained by ‚Äúthe non-destruction of the arura . . . ‚Äù

original: gcig pa can gyi sre ba'i shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
analyzed: gcig pa can gyi sre ba'i shes pa'i rgyur gyur pa yin no //
translated: Just as many arura plants and so on, even without a universal, produce a single effect characterized by the alleviation of fever, in the same way, even though the multicolored and so on are different objects, they are the cause of a single cognition that apprehends a single intrinsic nature, even though the universal does not exist as a real entity.

original: 'jigs med sogs mtshungs zhes bya ba ni aa ru ra la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
analyzed: 'jigs med sogs mtshungs zhes bya ba ni aa ru ra la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa ste /
translated: ‚ÄúLike fearlessness, etc.‚Äù means like myrobalan, etc.

original: don gcig byed pa nyid du 'dra'o //
analyzed: don gcig byed pa nyid du 'dra'o //
translated: They are similar in performing the same function.üîΩ‚ÄúBased on that‚Äù means based on the meaning of being like fearlessness, etc.,

original: de la brten nas zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i don de la brten nas te rgyur byas nas de nyams su myong bar sto bas kyis skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la don gyi rnam pa
analyzed: de la brten nas zhes bya ba ni mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang mtshungs pa'i don de la brten nas te rgyur byas nas de nyams su myong bar sto bas kyis skyes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de la don gyi rnam pa
translated: that is, taking that as a cause, whatever conceptual consciousness arises that experiences that, the aspect of the object that appears in that is called the aspect of the object.

original: nyid kyi don gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de'i bdag nyid du don gyi rnam pa snang ba de la gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'di brtags so zhes 'grel to //
analyzed: nyid kyi don gyi gzugs brnyan gang yin pa de'i bdag nyid du don gyi rnam pa snang ba de la gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba'i ming 'di brtags so zhes 'grel to //
translated: The aspect of the object that appears as the nature of that reflection of the object is designated with the name ‚Äúexclusion of other.‚Äù

original: rtog can gyi zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rtog can gyi zhes bya ba ni rtog pa dang bcas pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúOf the conceptual‚Äù means ‚Äúof the conceptual consciousness.‚Äù

original: 'di yang shes pa zhes bya ba dang gzhi mthun pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang shes pa zhes bya ba dang gzhi mthun pa yin no //
translated: This is also a common locus with ‚Äúconsciousness.‚Äù

original: don bdag med na yang zhes bya ba'i phyir rol gyi don gyi bdag nyid med par yang ngo //
analyzed: don bdag med na yang zhes bya ba'i phyir rol gyi don gyi bdag nyid med par yang ngo //
translated: The word also means that even though the object does not exist, the self-entity of the external object does not exist.

original: nges pa zhes bya ba ni zhen pa'o //
analyzed: nges pa zhes bya ba ni zhen pa'o //
translated: Certainty means adherence.

original: ci ste de la ji ltar gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba 'di bstan zhe na /
analyzed: ci ste de la ji ltar gzhan sel ba zhes bya ba 'di bstan zhe na /
translated: If one asks, Why is this called the exclusion of other?

original: snang ba gzhan las tha dad phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: snang ba gzhan las tha dad phyir // zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Because it is different from other appearances.

original: rgyu mtshan bzhis 'di sel zhes bshad pa yin te /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan bzhis 'di sel zhes bshad pa yin te /
translated: It is explained that this is an exclusion because of four reasons.

original: dngos su ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis sgro btags pa'i snang ba gzhan las tha dad pas rang nyid snang ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: dngos su ni rnam par rtog pa gzhan gyis sgro btags pa'i snang ba gzhan las tha dad pas rang nyid snang ba'i phyir te /
translated: In actuality, it is an exclusion because it is different from other appearances that are superimposed by other conceptual thoughts, since it appears as itself.

original: bsal bar byas na sle ba yin la /
analyzed: bsal bar byas na sle ba yin la /
translated: When it is excluded, it is obtained.

original: gzhan las sel ba zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan las sel ba zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is an exclusion from other because it is explained as an exclusion from other.

original: btags pa pa ni rgyu gsum gyis te /
analyzed: btags pa pa ni rgyu gsum gyis te /
translated: It is a designation because of three reasons.

original: rgyu la 'bras bu'i chos btags pa ste /
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu'i chos btags pa ste /
translated: It is a designation of the effect in the cause.

original: gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po ni /
analyzed: gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po ni /
translated: It is a thing that is an exclusion from other.

original: thob pa'i rgyu phyir zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: thob pa'i rgyu phyir zhes gang bshad pa yin no //
translated: It is because it is the cause of obtaining.

original: 'bras bu la rgyu'i chos btags pa'i phyir yang ste /
analyzed: 'bras bu la rgyu'i chos btags pa'i phyir yang ste /
translated: Also, because the effect is designated as the cause.

original: de ston pa ni ma 'dres @338a * //
analyzed: de ston pa ni ma 'dres @338a * //
translated: The teaching of that is:üîΩBecause of the approach of the unmixed

original: pa'i ; dngos po'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i phyir //
analyzed: pa'i ; dngos po'i sgo nas 'ongs pa'i phyir //
translated: entity.

original: zhes bya ba la ma 'dres pa ni gzhan dang ma 'brel ba gzhan las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la ma 'dres pa ni gzhan dang ma 'brel ba gzhan las ldog pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Unmixed means not connected with another, i.e., distinguished from another.

original: de nyid dngos po'i sgo ste thabs so //
analyzed: de nyid dngos po'i sgo ste thabs so //
translated: That itself is the approach, the means, of the entity.

original: de nyams su myong ba'i stobs kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyams su myong ba'i stobs kyis rnam pa de lta bu'i rnam par rtog pa skyes pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the arising of that kind of conceptualization through the power of the experience of that.üîΩThe teaching of the fourth cause, ‚Äúbecause of the confusion of the dissimilar eliminations together with the entity and because of the adherence of the understanders,‚Äù is:

original: rigs mi mthun pa sel ba'i dngos po dang lhan cig tu 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / rtogs pa po dag gis zhen pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu bzhi pa ston pa ni rigs mi mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa sel ba'i dngos po dang lhan cig tu 'khrul pa'i phyir dang / rtogs pa po dag gis zhen pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu bzhi pa ston pa ni rigs mi mthun pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The dissimilar eliminations, etc.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo la yod pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan no //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i blo la yod pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan no //
translated: The ‚Äúthis‚Äù is the reflected image of the object of the conceptual cognition.

original: rgyu mtshan dang bcas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang bcas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúTogether with the reason‚Äù means:

original: snang ba gzhan las tha dad phyir //
analyzed: snang ba gzhan las tha dad phyir //
translated: Because it is different from other appearances.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan bzhi dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgyu mtshan bzhi dang lhan cig 'jug pa'i phyir rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
translated: Because it operates together with four reasons, it is reasonable.

original: don gyi bdag nyid kyis sel ba'i don rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don gyi bdag nyid kyis sel ba'i don rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the meaning of the exclusion of other by way of its own nature, he says:

original: de'i rgyu rang gi mtshan nyid la ldog pa de yod pa'i phyir te ;
analyzed: de'i rgyu rang gi mtshan nyid la ldog pa de yod pa'i phyir te ;
translated: Because it has a reason, its own character, which is an exclusion.

original: rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan dang bcas pa'o //
translated: It is reasonable because it has a reason.

original: gzhan sel zhes bya ba'i ming 'di btags zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: gzhan sel zhes bya ba'i ming 'di btags zhes skabs dang sbyar ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúexclusion of other‚Äù is a name that is imputed.

original: de la rgyu mtshan bshad pa /
analyzed: de la rgyu mtshan bshad pa /
translated: The reason is explained:

original: gzhan ma 'dres pa yod phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: gzhan ma 'dres pa yod phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because of the existence of the unmixed other.

original: gzhan las te rigs mi mthun pa las ma 'dres pa ste /
analyzed: gzhan las te rigs mi mthun pa las ma 'dres pa ste /
translated: The other is the dissimilar class. The unmixed is the exclusion.

original: ldog pa de yod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ldog pa de yod pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because it has a reason, its own character, which is an exclusion.

original: rigs mi mthun pa dang ma 'dres pa yod phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa dang ma 'dres pa yod phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because of the existence of the dissimilar class, which is unmixed.

original: 'dis ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan sel par bstan pa ni dngos yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dis ni rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan sel par bstan pa ni dngos yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //
translated: This teaches that the teaching of the exclusion of other by way of its own nature is the actual meaning.

original: med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhan sel ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gzhan sel ba'i rang bzhin bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach the nature of the exclusion of other, which has the characteristic of a nonimplicative negation,

original: med par dgag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: med par dgag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúA nonimplicative negation,‚Äù and so on.

original: de'i phyir de ltar sel pa rnam pa gsum bstan nas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sel pa rnam pa gsum bstan nas /
translated: Thus, having taught the three types of exclusion,

original: skabs kyi sgra'i don la sbyar ba'i phyir /üîΩde la gzhan sel dang po 'di //
analyzed: skabs kyi sgra'i don la sbyar ba'i phyir / de la gzhan sel dang po 'di //
translated: in order to apply them to the meaning of the words of the present context,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, ‚ÄúThe first exclusion of other,‚Äù and so on.

original: dang po zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: dang po zhes bya ba ni ji skad du bshad pa'i don gyi gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid do //
translated: ‚Äú The first‚Äù is the one that has the nature of a reflected image, as explained above.

original: 'di la rgyu bshad pa ni /
analyzed: 'di la rgyu bshad pa ni /
translated: He explains the reason for this:

original: phyi rol don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: phyi rol don du zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúBecause external objects do not exist,‚Äù and so on.

original: gang kho na sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la snang ba de kho na sgra'i don du rigs kyi /
analyzed: gang kho na sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la snang ba de kho na sgra'i don du rigs kyi /
translated: It is reasonable that the object of a word is only that which appears to the cognition that arises from the word.

original: 'di la dgag pa nges pa yod pa ma yin la /
analyzed: 'di la dgag pa nges pa yod pa ma yin la /
translated: It is not that there is a definite negation here,

original: dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: dbang po'i shes pa bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid snang ba yang ma yin no //
translated: nor is it that its intrinsic identity appears, as it does in the case of a sense consciousness.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it, then?

original: sgra las byung ba'i blo'i @338b byi rol gyi don du zhen pa nye bar skye ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
analyzed: sgra las byung ba'i blo'i @338b byi rol gyi don du zhen pa nye bar skye ba 'ba' zhig tu zad do //
translated: The conception that arises from sound is merely the conception of an external object.

original: des na don gyi gzugs brnyan de nyid sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la dngos po de'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
analyzed: des na don gyi gzugs brnyan de nyid sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la dngos po de'i bdag nyid du snang ba'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, the form of the object appears to the cognition that arises from sound as if it were the nature of that thing.

original: sgra'i don du rigs kyi gzhan gyi ma yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: sgra'i don du rigs kyi gzhan gyi ma yin no snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, the object of the word is the object of the word itself, not of another.

original: gang yang sgra'i don dang lhan cig brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa grub pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes ston pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang sgra'i don dang lhan cig brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa grub pa de ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kho na yin no zhes ston pa ni /
translated: The relation that is established between the object of the word and the thing that is expressed and the expression is the nature of cause and effect.

original: blo de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: blo de'i ngo bo zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says, ‚ÄúThe nature of that cognition,‚Äù and so on.

original: phyi rol gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nges pa de'i ngo bo ste rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste ;
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nges pa de'i ngo bo ste rang bzhin gang la yod pa de la de skad ces bya ste ;
translated: The nature of that cognition that is ascertained as the characteristic of an external thing is its essence, and that which has it is so called.

original: de'i ngo bo yang yin la gzugs brnyan yang yin zhes bsdu'o //
analyzed: de'i ngo bo yang yin la gzugs brnyan yang yin zhes bsdu'o //
translated: The meaning of the compound ‚Äúreflection of that‚Äù is that it is both the entity of that and a reflection.

original: blo'i de'i ngo bo'i gzugs brnyan de'i 'brel pa nyid sgra las skyes pa na ste 'byung ba na rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dngos po'i mtshan nyid de dpyad pa na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po bdag nyid kho nar grub ste 'di ltar sgra ni gzugsüîΩbrnyan de skyed par byed pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa brjod la /
analyzed: blo'i de'i ngo bo'i gzugs brnyan de'i 'brel pa nyid sgra las skyes pa na ste 'byung ba na rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dngos po'i mtshan nyid de dpyad pa na rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos po bdag nyid kho nar grub ste 'di ltar sgra ni gzugs brnyan de skyed par byed pa'i phyir rjod par byed pa brjod la /
translated: When the reflection of the entity of the cognition arises from sound, that is, when it occurs, the nature of the thing is analyzed by the definition of the expression, and the nature of cause and effect is established by itself.üîΩSound is the expression because it produces that reflection.

original: gzugs brnyan de yang sgras bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir brjod bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs brnyan de yang sgras bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir brjod bya'o //
translated: And that reflection is the expressed because it is produced by sound.

original: de'i phyir sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra las byung ba'i shes pa la /
translated: Therefore, with regard to the cognition that arises from sound,

original: dgag pa tsam 'dir snang ba min //
analyzed: dgag pa tsam 'dir snang ba min //
translated: the mere negation does not appear here.

original: zhes gang smras pa de ni 'brel pa med pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes gang smras pa de ni 'brel pa med pa yin te /
translated: What is said is not related to that.

original: dgag pa tsam sgra'i don du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
analyzed: dgag pa tsam sgra'i don du khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro snyam du bsams pa yin no //
translated: The meaning is that the mere negation is not accepted as the meaning of the word.

original: de ltar re zhig gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid kyis sel ba ni dngos su sgras bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dngos kyi sgra'i don yin no zhes bstan nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig gzugs brnyan gyi mtshan nyid kyis sel ba ni dngos su sgras bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dngos kyi sgra'i don yin no zhes bstan nas /
translated: Thus, the exclusion by the character of a reflection is the primary meaning of a word, because it is the direct object to be produced by a word.

original: sel ba lhag ma rnams kyang sgra'i don nye bar btags par brjod pa na 'gal ba med pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir de ltar rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sel ba lhag ma rnams kyang sgra'i don nye bar btags par brjod pa na 'gal ba med pa nyid do zhes bstan pa'i phyir de ltar rnam pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Having taught that, in order to show that there is no contradiction when the remaining exclusions are also said to be the secondary meaning of a word, he says, ‚ÄúIn that way, etc.‚Äù

original: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba yin pas so //
analyzed: de ltar zhes bya ba ni bskyed par bya ba yin pas so //
translated: ‚ÄúIn that way‚Äù means that it is the direct object to be produced.

original: yang ci'i phyir shugs kyis med par dgag pa rtogs zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir shugs kyis med par dgag pa rtogs zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to show why the absence of a word is understood by implication, he says,

original: de'i bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i bdag ces bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: ‚ÄúThe nature of that, etc.‚Äù

original: de'i ste ba lang la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid de ni gzhan te rta la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid de rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ste ba lang la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid de ni gzhan te rta la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid de rang bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The nature of that, i.e., the reflection of a cow, etc., is different, i.e., the nature of the reflection of a horse, etc., because it is not its nature.

original: de ltar rtogs pa ni med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sel ba med na mi @339a * //
analyzed: de ltar rtogs pa ni med par dgag pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sel ba med na mi @339a * //
translated: Thus, if the object of negation is not eliminated by the defining characteristic of nonexistence, then the object of negation is not refuted.üîΩ

original: 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir brtags nas sgra'i don nyid du bstan nas /
analyzed: 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir brtags nas sgra'i don nyid du bstan nas /
translated: Thus, since such an understanding does not occur without the exclusion that is the characteristic of non-implicative negation, it is taught to be the meaning of a word through imputation.

original: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bstan pa'i phyir /üîΩdngos po dag dang 'brel pa na //
analyzed: rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bstan pa'i phyir / dngos po dag dang 'brel pa na //
translated: In order to teach its own characteristic,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it is said, ‚ÄúThe connection with things‚Ä¶‚Äù

original: de la 'brel pa ni sgra dngos po la brgyud nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ste 'di ltar thog mar ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po nyams su myong ngo //
analyzed: de la 'brel pa ni sgra dngos po la brgyud nas rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid kyi 'brel pa ste 'di ltar thog mar ji ltar gnas pa'i dngos po nyams su myong ngo //
translated: Therein, connection is the connection that is the characteristic of cause and effect indirectly related to a word and a thing, because first one experiences a thing as it abides.

original: de las brjod par 'dod do //
analyzed: de las brjod par 'dod do //
translated: Then, one wishes to express it.

original: de nas rkan la sogs pa yongs su 'gul lo //
analyzed: de nas rkan la sogs pa yongs su 'gul lo //
translated: Then, the palate and so on move.

original: de las sgra'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rgyud pa gang gi tshe sgra phyi rol gyi me la sogs pa'i dngos po dang 'brel par gyur pa de'i tshe 'brel pa de yod na rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po yang don gyis go bas rtogsüîΩpar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las sgra'o zhes bya ba de lta bu'i rgyud pa gang gi tshe sgra phyi rol gyi me la sogs pa'i dngos po dang 'brel par gyur pa de'i tshe 'brel pa de yod na rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa'i dngos po yang don gyis go bas rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word from that means that when sound is related to external things such as fire, then, if that relation exists, the thing that is the opposite of dissimilar types is understood by implication and is known.

original: de'i phyir med par dgag pa dang gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi sel ba rnam pa gnyi ga yang sgra'i don yin no zhes nye bar btags pa yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir med par dgag pa dang gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po'i bdag nyid kyi sel ba rnam pa gnyi ga yang sgra'i don yin no zhes nye bar btags pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, both types of exclusion, which have the nature of external negation and the opposite of other, are designated as the meaning of words.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid do //
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid do //

analyzed: yang gi sgra las med par dgag pa'i bdag nyid kyang ngo //

original: de'i phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po la 'od byed pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po la 'od byed pas /
translated: Therefore, the master DignƒÅga said in the ƒÄlokamƒÅlƒÅ:

analyzed: ci ste de nyid 'di'i rang gi don yin pa de lta na yang /

analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid kyi don de la don gzhan rnam par bcad pa'i gzugs brnyan gzhan las ldog pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi bdag nyid kyi sel ba byed ce na te skyed par byed pa sgra rjod par byed do zhes brjod pa'i slob dpon

analyzed: de la gal te ba lang zhes bya ba'i sgra zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang smras pa de la /
translated: The meaning of the statement, ‚Äúbecause

original: de'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i gzugs brnyan zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe reflection of that . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: sgras ba lang gi blo nyid skyed par byed /
analyzed: sgras ba lang gi blo nyid skyed par byed /
translated: The word ‚Äúcow‚Äù itself generates the cognition of a cow.

original: gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i shugs kyis rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i shugs kyis rtogs pa yin te /
translated: It is understood by the force of its being unmixed with others.

original: sgra las ni ma yin no //
analyzed: sgra las ni ma yin no //

original: de'i ba lang gi gzugs brnyan ni snang ba gzhan gyi bdag nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i ba lang gi gzugs brnyan ni snang ba gzhan gyi bdag nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ro //

original: gzhan du na nges pa'i ngo bo de rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na nges pa'i ngo bo de rtogs par mi 'gyur ro //

analyzed: des na ba lang gi blo skyed pa'i sgra gzhan btsal mi dgos te /

translated: Because the word ‚Äúcow‚Äù itself generates the cognition of a cow.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /

original: nyin mo za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: nyin mo za ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response to that is ‚ÄúThe one who eats during the day . . . ‚Äù and so on.

original: dper na lha spyin tshon po nyin par zan mi za'o zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ni dngos su nyin mo za ba skad la /
analyzed: dper na lha spyin tshon po nyin par zan mi za'o zhes bya ba'i ngag 'di ni dngos su nyin mo za ba skad la /
translated: For example, this statement, ‚ÄúFat Devadatta does not eat during the day,‚Äù directly states that he eats during the day.

original: rang gi don brjod pas mtshan mo za ba shugs kyis bsgrub pa yin gyi dngos su ni ma yin pa de bzhin du ba lang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ston pa'i sgra'i dngos kyi 'bras bu ni rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yin
analyzed: rang gi don brjod pas mtshan mo za ba shugs kyis bsgrub pa yin gyi dngos su ni ma yin pa de bzhin du ba lang zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i rjes su 'gro ba ston pa'i sgra'i dngos kyi 'bras bu ni rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yin
translated: In the same way, the direct effect of the word that teaches the forward order, ‚Äúcow, horse, etc.,‚Äù is the cognition of the forward order,

original: la / ldog pa rtogs pa'i shugs las yin no //üîΩde la rgyu bshad pa ni /
analyzed: la / ldog pa rtogs pa'i shugs las yin no // de la rgyu bshad pa ni /
translated: and the understanding of the reverse order is implicit.üîΩThe explanation of the reason is as follows.

original: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: gang gi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The passage beginning with ‚Äúbecause‚Äù indicates the reason.

original: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa ni ldog pa dang mi ldan pa la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir rjes su 'gro ba sgrub pa ni ldog pa dang mi ldan pa la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: The reason is that the establishment of the forward order does not occur in the absence of the reverse order.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /üîΩrigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod pa la @340a * //
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na / rigs mi mthun pa rnam par gcod pa la @340a * //

original: mi 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi 'khrul pa nyid yin no //
translated: The reason is that there is no error in the exclusion of dissimilar things.

original: rigs mi mthun pa las mi ldog pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rigs mi mthun pa las mi ldog pa ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: There is no exclusion of dissimilar things that is not exclusion.

original: des na sgra gcig gi 'bras bu gnyis 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na sgra gcig gi 'bras bu gnyis 'gal ba med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, there is no contradiction in the two effects of a single word.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de'i phyir rang don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rang don zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The reason is stated in the passage beginning with ‚Äúbecause.‚Äù

original: gal te sgra gcig dngos su sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu gnyis cig car 'dod par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te sgra gcig dngos su sgrub pa dang dgag pa'i shes pa'i mtshan nyid 'bras bu gnyis cig car 'dod par gyur na /
translated: If one maintains that the two effects, the cognition that directly affirms and the cognition that directly negates, are simultaneous,

original: gang gi tshe na nyin mo za ba'i tshig bzhin du gcig dngos su dang gzhan shugs kyis thob pa'i 'bras bu shes 'dod pa de'i tshe 'gal ba med do //üîΩgang yang / gang gis ba lang min dgag phyir //
analyzed: gang gi tshe na nyin mo za ba'i tshig bzhin du gcig dngos su dang gzhan shugs kyis thob pa'i 'bras bu shes 'dod pa de'i tshe 'gal ba med do // gang yang / gang gis ba lang min dgag phyir //
translated: then there is no contradiction when one wishes to know the effect that is directly obtained by one and indirectly obtained by the other, like the words ‚Äúhe eats during the day.‚Äù

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang bsal ba yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smras pa de yang bsal ba yin te /
translated: Also, the statement ‚Äúbecause of the negation of non-ox‚Äù is refuted.

original: khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not accepted.

original: kho bo cig gis ni sgras dngos su ba lang ma yin pa dgag pa byed do zhes khas blangs so //
analyzed: kho bo cig gis ni sgras dngos su ba lang ma yin pa dgag pa byed do zhes khas blangs so //
translated: We do not accept that the word directly performs the negation of non-ox.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what?

original: shugs kyis so zhes bstan zin to //üîΩgang gis ba lang min ldog pa'i //
analyzed: shugs kyis so zhes bstan zin to // gang gis ba lang min ldog pa'i //
translated: It is taught that it is done indirectly.

original: spyi ni brjod bya zhes gang smras pa de la ;
analyzed: spyi ni brjod bya zhes gang smras pa de la ;
translated: As for the statement ‚Äúthe universal that is the opposite of non-ox is the object of expression,‚Äù

original: de 'dra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de 'dra'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: in response to that, the root text says, ‚ÄúThat kind of . . .‚Äù and so on.

original: de 'dra zhes bya ba ni phyi'i ngo bo nyid du zhen pa'i blo'i rnam pa'o //
analyzed: de 'dra zhes bya ba ni phyi'i ngo bo nyid du zhen pa'i blo'i rnam pa'o //
translated: ‚ÄúSuch‚Äù is the form of the cognition that conceives the external nature.

original: 'di la 'thad pa bshad pa ni khra bo la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la 'thad pa bshad pa ni khra bo la sogs zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: The explanation of the rationale is as follows:

original: khra bo la sogs pa thams cad la ba lang zhes mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid du nges pa'i phyir de dag gi de spyi zhes brjod do //
analyzed: khra bo la sogs pa thams cad la ba lang zhes mtshungs pa'i ngo bo nyid du nges pa'i phyir de dag gi de spyi zhes brjod do //
translated: Since all variegated things are ascertained as having the same nature, called ‚Äúcow,‚Äù they are said to be its universal.üîΩThe external nature is also conventionally designated by the power of deluded cognition, but not ultimately.

original: phyi'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyang 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis tha snyad du byed kyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes ston pa ni /üîΩdngos po snyam du zhen pa'i phyir //
analyzed: phyi'i dngos po'i ngo bo nyid kyang 'khrul pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis tha snyad du byed kyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes ston pa ni / dngos po snyam du zhen pa'i phyir //
translated: To show this, he says:

original: zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'o //
translated: Because of the conception of ‚Äúthing.‚Äù

original: gal te phyi rol gyi dngos po la brten pa'i spyi dngos por gyur pa dngos po zhig res 'ga' dmigs par gyur na /
analyzed: gal te phyi rol gyi dngos po la brten pa'i spyi dngos por gyur pa dngos po zhig res 'ga' dmigs par gyur na /
translated: If the universal that is based on external things were an existent thing, sometimes it would be observed.

original: de'i chos mthun pa mthong ba las de la spyir 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de'i chos mthun pa mthong ba las de la spyir 'khrul bar 'gyur te /
translated: Then, from seeing its common property, there would be error regarding its universality.

original: ji srid du khyed la dngos kyi don mi srid pa na de nyid spyir 'khrul pa mi 'thad pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas /
analyzed: ji srid du khyed la dngos kyi don mi srid pa na de nyid spyir 'khrul pa mi 'thad pa ma yin no zhes dogs pa bsu nas /
translated: Having anticipated this doubt, he says:

original: shes te rang gi ngo bo la //
analyzed: shes te rang gi ngo bo la //
translated: The cognition of that is due to an internal error,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: not due to seeing a similarity.

original: skad cig gis ni zhes bya ba chos mthun pa mthong ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med pas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du nang gi bslang pa kho na las de'i shes pa skye ba yin te /
analyzed: skad cig gis ni zhes bya ba chos mthun pa mthong ba la sogs pa la ltos pa med pas zla ba gnyis la sogs pa'i shes pa bzhin du nang gi bslang pa kho na las de'i shes pa skye ba yin te /
translated: The cognition of that arises from an internal error alone, without depending on seeing a similarity, like the cognition of two moons and so on, because it is momentary.

original: 'khrul pa thams cad chos mthun pa mthong ba nyid las 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'khrul pa thams cad chos mthun pa mthong ba nyid las 'byung ba ni ma yin no //
translated: Not all delusions arise from seeing a similarity.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: Well then, what is it?

original: nang gi bslad pa las @340b kyang yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: nang gi bslad pa las @340b kyang yin pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: It is due to an internal error. Therefore there is no fault.

original: des na grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na grub pa la sgrub pa'i skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Thus, in order to show that there is no fault of proving what is already established, he says:

original: de yi rnam pa de nyid kyang //
analyzed: de yi rnam pa de nyid kyang //
translated: That form of that is also not real,

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
